mapper.select: SELECT POCKET_NO, EXPENSE_DATE, EXPENSE_DETAIL, EXPENSE_CASH, EXPENSE_CARD, EXPENSE_CATEGORY FROM aws.POCKET_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO aws.POCKET_INFO(POCKET_NO, USER_NO,EXPENSE_DATE, EXPENSE_DETAIL,EXPENSE_CASH, EXPENSE_CARD, EXPENSE_CATEGORY) VALUES((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(PI.POCKET_NO),10000000)+1 FROM aws.POCKET_INFO PI), #{user_no},#{expense_date}, #{expense_detail},#{expense_cash},#{expense_card},#{expense_category})

INSERT INTO aws.POCKET_INFO(POCKET_NO, USER_NO,EXPENSE_DATE, EXPENSE_DETAIL, EXPENSE_CATEGORY) VALUES((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(PI.POCKET_NO),10000000)+1 FROM aws.POCKET_INFO PI), #{user_no},#{expense_date}, #{expense_detail},#{expense_category})
